entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support URL's in workload update's --from-rollback-file parameter #20879
  • Make inheritdoc the default comment specification for interface and override methods #20858
  • Intermittent Workload CLI errors: 'Number of entries expected in End of Central Directory...' #20849
  • dotnet watch verbose started does not show arguments #20843
  • Segmentation fault .NET core 5.0 #20842
  • After upgrade from net6 rc1 to rc2, the setup failed. #20834
  • After Install 6.0 RC1 on Mac OS, install wasm-tools workload via Terminal met an error "Workload installation failed". #20833
  • windows arm64 dotnet SDK fails to publish self-contained #20840

Closed

  • With .NET 6 RC2 SDK, Create projects failed due to lacking '/usr/share/dotnet/sdk-manifests' when using .deb and .rpm installers #20836

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/6.0.1xx with rc1 #20877
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix workload pack records serialization #20876
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove MMI dependency #20867
    Area-Workloads
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.3xx #20864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.2xx #20863
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pass in position to .GetSuggestions() #20852
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1352196 #20851
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report args in dotnet watch ProcessRunner #20844
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1351740 #20841
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert "Revert "Ensure the server and client are valid when sending / receiving hot reload messages"" #20874
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Release 6.0.1xx] [PackageValidation] Improve warnings about references when running PackageValidation in a project after packaging it. #20822
    Servicing-consider, Area-Compatibility
  • Add self contained short flag #19681
  • Do not specify a protocol if server does not require secrets #20577
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [main] Add targeting pack VS.Redist dependencies #20792
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add targeting pack VS.Redist dependencies #20791
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use 1ES build pools #20644
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions (#20602) #20850
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions #20602
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Respect BlazorWebAssemblyLoadAllGlobalizationData in hosted projects during publish (#20800) #20835
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [release/3.1.1xx] Remove blob feeds #20553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Blazor AOT Cache Busting #20630
    Area-AspNetCore
